resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82151</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82151</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4236</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">We're all here today</string>
            <string language="es">Hoy estamos todos aquí</string>
            <string language="ga">Táimid ar fad anseo inniu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alle wir sind hier heute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nous sommes tous ici aujourd'hui</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nós somos todos aqui hoje</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Siamo oggi tutti qui</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είμαστε όλοι εδώ σήμερα</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Song for  students to listen to/sing a group song, which will promote feelings of inclusion. Can be enjoyed by students in the severe, moderate and lower mild ranges of special needs through listening or singing, according to ability.</string>
            <string language="es">Canciones para estudiantes para que escuchen/canten una canción de grupo, que fomentará sus sentimientos de inclusión. Pueden disfrutar de ellas los estudiantes de los niveles severo, moderado y menos leve de necesidades especiales, bien sea escuchando o</string>
            <string language="ga">Amhrán ar féidir le leanaí éisteacht leis/canadh i ngrúpa, a chuirifdh mothú iniaimh chun cinn. Féadfaidh daltaí i réimsí riachtanais speisialta dona, measarthach ahus bog taitneamh a bhaint as trí éisteacht nó canadh, de réir mar atá a gcumas.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Music</string>
            <string language="es">Música. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lied, damit Kursteilnehmer to/sing ein Gruppe 
Lied hören, das Gefühle der Einbeziehung fördert. Kann von 
den Kursteilnehmern in den strengen, gemäßigten und untereren milden
Strecken der speziellen Notwendigkeiten durch das Hören oder das 
Singen, entsprechend Fähigkeit genossen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chanson pour que les étudiants écoutent to/sing
une chanson de groupe, qui favorisera des sentiments d'inclusion. 
Peut être apprécié par des étudiants dans les intervalles 
doux graves, modérés et inférieurs des besoins spéciaux par 
l'écoute ou le chant, selon des capacités.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Canção para que os estudantes escutem to/sing 
uma canção do grupo, que promova sentimentos do inclusion. 
Pode ser apreciado por estudantes nas escalas suaves severas, 
moderadas e mais baixas de necessidades especiais com escutar ou 
cantar, de acordo com a abilidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Canzone affinchè allievi ascoltino to/sing una 
canzone del gruppo, che promuoverà le sensibilità dell'inclusione. 
Può essere goduto dagli allievi nelle gamme delicate severe, 
moderate e più basse di bisogni speciali con ascoltare o il canto, 
secondo abilità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το τραγούδι για τους σπουδαστές για να 
ακούσουν/τραγουδά ένα τραγούδι ομάδας, το οποίο θα προωθήσει τα
συναισθήματα του συνυπολογισμού. Μπορέστε να αποληφθείτε 
από τους σπουδαστές στα αυστηρά, μέτρια και χαμηλότερα ήπια 
φάσματα ειδικών αναγκών μέσω του ακούσματος ή του τραγουδιού, 
σύμφωνα με τη δυνατότητα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
